teaser: Texas Governor Rick Perry is visiting California this week to attract companies away from the Golden State with promises of low taxes and fewer regulations. The EU's Justice Commissioner says American companies like Google and Facebook must abide by a proposed new European law on data protection or face stiff penalties. The U.S. trade deficit shrank at the end of 2012, thanks in part to higher exports. Which of world's economies depend most on exports?
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, February 11, 2013
byline: Queena Kim, Jeff Tyler, Amy Scott, Chester Wisniewski, Sam Beard, Ralph Young, Stephan Richter, Tracey Samuelson, David Willey and Jeremy Hobson
description: Texas Governor Rick Perry is visiting California this week to attract companies away from the Golden State with promises of low taxes and fewer regulations. The EU's Justice Commissioner says American companies like Google and Facebook must abide by a proposed new European law on data protection or face stiff penalties. The U.S. trade deficit shrank at the end of 2012, thanks in part to higher exports. Which of world's economies depend most on exports?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, February 11, 2013
